characters.story: Grandchild child and line sing "Sun!" cheerfully - grandson continuing the thread!
To withdraw from divination commands "Chueh!" sharply - retreat, yet stand firm!
A foot of flesh bends down drooping saying "Jiao" at the base!
Apparel with moon hand questions "Foo? What clothing?" curiously to wear!
Fate's mouth opens, commanding "Ming!" sharply - life's destiny spoken!
To stay in field questions "Lyo? Remain here?" curiously detained!
To slide on water sings "Lyo!" cheerfully slipping away skating!
To chat with ear questions "Liao? Talk more?" curiously passing time!
Willow tree bends down drooping like "Lyo" - branches swaying gently!
Orders stamped with seal command "Ling!" sharply - the decree is issued!
Cold ice orders bend down drooping saying "Leng" - frozen and chilled!
Zero rain orders question "Ling? Nothing left?" curiously empty!
A collar at the neck bends down drooping saying "Ling" - usher forward by the lead!
To communicate on pogo stick sings "Tong!" cheerfully bouncing - common passage through!
Courageous power bends down drooping saying "Yong" - brave and valiant!
A criminal dog half-committed commands "Fan!" sharply violating rules!
Danger! Rock climbing bound by fingerprints sings "Way!" anxiously high on the cliff!
Fragile flesh in danger commands "Tsway!" sharply - brittle and easily broken!
Print with hand seal commands "Yin!" sharply - stamp marking India's mark!
